author: James Nieves
title: Download this free BlackBerry KEYone shield wallpaper!
text:
Good ole Pootermobile is at it again, this time dropping some cool new KEYone typography and the BlackBerry security shield in his latest wallpaper.

Good ole Pootermobile is at it again, this time dropping some cool new KEYone typography and the BlackBerry security shield in his latest wallpaper.
If you're digging the wallpaper, or change your wallpaper regularly, I get it. Here's something new for your home screen to get you in new device spirit!
KEYone Shield Wallpaper https://t.co/NAa0dMd1qM pic.twitter.com/qFP7Bgi0fy 
â€” L. Marco Miranda (@Pootermobile) March 25, 2017 This prompted me to ask if Marco could create a special version just for us here on CB.
With the image reworked and a sweet orange shield , it feels right at home here on CrackBerry. I even mocked it up on the BlackBerry KEYone for sheer drool factor. You're welcome.
Shout out to Pootermobile for keeping our device screens fresh. Download links can be found below for each color variant.
Download KEYone Shield Wallpaper
